adapter_name.title: Name
adapter_name.description: Provide a unique name for this adapter instance. Example: openai-emb-1

model.title: Model
model.description: Provide the name of the model. Recommended: text-embedding-3-small, text-embedding-3-large

dimensions.title: Dimensions
dimensions.description: Output embedding dimensions. Only supported by text-embedding-3-* models. Leave empty for default dimensions (1536 for small, 3072 for large).
